description: Instagram is a social media platform for sharing photos, videos, and stories. Only supports Instagram Business and Creator accounts, not Instagram Personal accounts.

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_CREATE_CAROUSEL_CONTAINER
capabilities.description: Create a draft carousel post with multiple images/videos before publishing.

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_CREATE_MEDIA_CONTAINER
capabilities.description: Create a draft media container for photos/videos/reels before publishing.

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_CREATE_POST
capabilities.description: Publish a draft media container to Instagram (final publishing step).

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_GET_CONVERSATION
capabilities.description: Get details about a specific Instagram DM conversation (participants, etc).

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_GET_POST_COMMENTS
capabilities.description: Get comments on an Instagram post.

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_GET_POST_INSIGHTS
capabilities.description: Get Instagram post insights/analytics (impressions, reach, engagement, etc.).

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_GET_POST_STATUS
capabilities.description: Check the processing status of a draft post container.

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_GET_USER_INFO
capabilities.description: Get Instagram user info including profile details and statistics.

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_GET_USER_INSIGHTS
capabilities.description: Get Instagram account-level insights and analytics (profile views, reach, follower count, etc.). metric_type (time_series or total_value): When set to total_value, the API returns a total_value object instead of values. breakdown: Only applicable when metric_type=total_value and only for supported metrics. timeframe: Required for demographics-related metrics and overrides since/until for those metrics.

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_GET_USER_MEDIA
capabilities.description: Get Instagram user's media (posts, photos, videos).

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_LIST_ALL_CONVERSATIONS
capabilities.description: List all Instagram DM conversations for the authenticated user.

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_LIST_ALL_MESSAGES
capabilities.description: List all messages from a specific Instagram DM conversation.

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_MARK_SEEN
capabilities.description: Mark Instagram DM messages as read/seen for a specific user.

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_REPLY_TO_COMMENT
capabilities.description: Reply to a comment on Instagram media.

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_SEND_IMAGE
capabilities.description: Send an image via Instagram DM to a specific user.

capabilities.name: INSTAGRAM_SEND_TEXT_MESSAGE
capabilities.description: Send a text message to an Instagram user via DM.
